sentences.sContent: The escalator wafts us up and down every day.
sentences.sCn: 自动扶梯天天送我们上上下下。

sentences.sContent: What you do is squat up and down really fast.
sentences.sCn: 你 所要做的就是真正快速地上下蹲坐。

synos.tran: 上上下下；到处；前前后后；来来往往

trans.tranOther: to a higher position and then a lower position, several times
